name: Cake class in Carlisle with Paul Bradford
description:
SATURDAY THE 21ST OF SEPTEMBER

Update! Classes To be held in Carlisle Old Town Hall. If you have booked then you will have an email with full details.  If you need anymore info then please get in touch using the contact tab


Celebrating our September Launch of the brand new fully equipped studio you can learn each step involved in making this chocolate wrap with Paul Bradford.

Paul has kindly agreed to return after the massive sold out success of his last courses in Carlisle with us! 

Paul will be at our studio for 2 days (2 separate classes) sharing and teaching his amazing cake decorating skills. 

Price of the Saturday class includes, the cakes to decorate and take home, Lunch and refreshments throughout the day and a chance to pick the brains of a leading cake designer!

There are 10 spaces available as they are taken we will update right here

1 available

Held in our new studio In Carlisle Cumbria 

(sat nav CA2 5BB) We'll start at 9.30 and finish at 5pm on Saturday 21st of September 2013

If you would like help with booking accommodation email us on enquiries@thesweetdreamcakecompany.co.uk

name: Online suarcraft and cake decorating tutorials. 6 MONTH MEMBERSHIP Cake classes in Cumbria
description:
Passing on our International award winning experience directly to you!!

For only £30 you can learn a wide range of Sugar craft. People modelling, animals, handbags, shoes and much much more. We teach you how to cover cakes to a professional finish, butter cream and nozzle guides. We also add seasonal guides to give you some fab ranges of cakes to make and enjoy with your family or sell to customers.

There are lots of exclusive members only hints and tips as well.

Most of our guides are achieved using the simplest of tools, there's no complicated jargon and full easy to follow step by step photographs with written instruction.

This is perfect if you want to add a wow factor to your cakes, or maybe you would like to start a career in Cake decorating, we can help you on the way!

name: Online Sugarcraft tutorials. BACK CATALOGUE. Cake classes in Carlisle
description:
Passing on our International award winning experience directly to you!!

Most of our guides are achieved using the simplest of tools, there's no complicated jargon and full easy to follow step by step photographs with written instruction.

This is perfect if you want to add a wow factor to your cakes, or maybe you would like to start a career in Cake decorating, we can help you on the way!

2) Baby Mickey and Minnie mouse cake toppers
3) Female figure modelling

When we receive your order, you will be sent the guides via email within 24 hours of purchase

name: Cake Classes online sugarcraft tutorials. FULL YEAR MEMBERSHIP
description:
Passing on our International award winning experience directly to you!!

SALE NOW ON!  To celebrate our 4ft Tardis cake entry into Cake International, you now get 12 months for the price of 6! A massive £25 off the normal price!

For only £55 you can learn a wide range of Sugar craft. People modelling, animals, handbags, shoes and much much more. We teach you how to cover cakes to a professional finish, buttercream and nozzle guides. We also add seasonal guides to give you some fab ranges of cakes to make and enjoy with your family or sell to customers.

We've already published a range of guides, and there are lots of exclusive members only hints and tips as well.

Most of our guides are achieved using the simplest of tools, there's no complicated jargon and full easy to follow step by step photographs with written instruction.

This is perfect if you want to add a wow factor to your cakes, or maybe you would like to start a career in Cake decorating, we can help you on the way!

Titles to be sent immediately include
1) Mini handbag cupcake topper
2) Baby Mickey and Minnie mouse cake toppers
3) Female figure modelling 
4) Designer Shoe cake topper (full size shoe)
5) Pooh, piglet, Eeyore and tigger, sugarcarft toppers
6) How to professionally cover a round sponge cake

15) Lucky the Westie

When we receive your order, you will be given a password to create an exclusive account on our website with 24 hour access to your tutorial library! !!!!!

As well as receiving all our existing guides, you'll get each additional guide we produce for 12 months from the date of purchase!
